rule_text_one: allocationtransferagencyidentifier, agencyidentifier, beginningperiodofavailability, endingperiodofavailability, availabilitytypecode, mainaccountcode, subaccountcode
rule_text_two: allocation_transfer_agency, agency_identifier, beginning_period_of_availability, ending_period_of_availability, availability_type_code, main_account_code, sub_account_code
description: TAS components: The combination of all the elements that make up the TAS must match the Treasury Central Accounting Reporting System (CARS). AgencyIdentifier, MainAccountCode, and SubAccountCode are always required. AllocationTransferAgencyIdentifier, BeginningPeriodOfAvailability, EndingPeriodOfAvailability and AvailabilityTypeCode are required if present in the CARS table.
Must be valid Agency ID in the Common Government-wide Accounting Classification (CGAC)
Must be valid Agency ID in the Common Government-wide Accounting Classification (CGAC)
If the reporting period end date is within Q1, FYB dates are required in file A, B & C as a soft edit. It would be optional in subsequent periods.
Must be a valid program activity name for the corresponding TAS/TAFS as defined in Section 82 of OMB Circular A-11.
